result.eng: They were kissing in broad daylight.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag pógadh a chéile os comhair an tsaoil
result.orig: Bhí siad ag pógadh a chéile os comhair an tsaoil
result.html: Bhí siad ag pógadh a chéile os comhair an tsaoilThey were kissing in broad daylight.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag pógaḋ a ċéile os coṁair an tsaoilThey were kissing in broad daylight.

result.eng: After all, he is a politician, it is his job.
result.ga: Tar éis an tsaoil is polaiteoir é is é a jab é
result.orig: Tar éis an tsaoil is polaiteoir é is é a jab é
result.html: Tar éis an tsaoil is polaiteoir é is é a jab éAfter all, he is a politician, it is his job.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis an tsaoil is polaiteoir é is é a jab éAfter all, he is a politician, it is his job.

result.eng: I was thinking, I'd love to go to the party after all.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag cuimhneamh ba bhreá liom a dhul chuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoil
result.orig: Bhí mé ag cuimhneamh ba bhreá liom a dhul chuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoil
result.html: Bhí mé ag cuimhneamh ba bhreá liom a dhul chuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoilI was thinking, I'd love to go to the party after all.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag cuiṁneaṁ ba ḃreá liom a ḋul ċuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoilI was thinking, I'd love to go to the party after all.

result.eng: In addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ga: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.orig: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.html: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ponchtml: Anuas ar sin ní ṫig éalú ó ġnáṫċúraimí an tsaoil a ṫiteann ar ḋuine ar nós airgead a ṫuilleaṁ nó clann a ṫógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.

result.eng: As soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
result.ga: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoil
result.orig: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoil
result.html: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoilAs soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
result.ponchtml: Aon uair aṁáin a ġeiḃ duine ciall tá deireaḋ aige le haoiḃneas an tsaoilAs soon as one grows up, the fun is over.

result.eng: This must be the end of the world.
result.ga: Caithfidh sé go bhfuil deireadh an tsaoil ann
result.orig: Caithfidh sé go bhfuil deireadh an tsaoil ann
result.html: Caithfidh sé go bhfuil deireadh an tsaoil annThis must be the end of the world.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ sé go ḃfuil deireaḋ an tsaoil annThis must be the end of the world.

result.eng: He felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
result.ga: Bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do Mhicheál Dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht air
result.orig: Bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do Mhicheál Dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht air
result.html: Bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do Mhicheál Dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht airHe felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí truaiġ an tsaoil aige do Ṁiċeál Duḃ agus don ḃail a ċuir an ḃantraċt airHe felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
